TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you end up getting arrested for doing something similar to this: www.youtube.com/watch?v=WyviaJYQk1c

I wish that Google would buy Microsoft, Sony, and Nintendo.

Edited May 24, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, but doing so stagnates the games console market.

I wish for good ideas.

Granted. Your mind is now full with good ideas that your head explodes.

I wish for awesome ideas.

Granted, no one can match your ideas so they need you for every idea.

I wish to be eccentric.

Granted, but you are so eccentric that everyone avoids you and you become alone.

I wish that Unix/Linux Systems took over the PC World rather than Windows Systems.

Granted. Commercial Linux dists become dominant and every bit as bad as the Windows and Mac systems most people are stuck with today.

I wish to be able to come up with extremely quotable one-liners.

Granted, people do nothing on the forums anymore than quote your one liners.

I wish to be British eccentric.

(How could you... ) granted, but they start making bad computers that can't run ksp

I wish I could get to anywhere without using infini-fuel

Edit: fail, and I don't know what that means ^^

Granted, you can now get to anywhere with 1 extra fuel unit along with infinite fuel.

I wish that my internet was faster.

Granted, it runs so fast it gets friction and heats up till it explodes.

I wish to be British eccentric.

Granted, but Britain expels you out of the country for being so eccentric.

I wish for what were those?

Granted, you become very confused and explode as a result

I wish to think of a good avatar to use.

(The UK would never expel someone for being eccentric, no matter how much , we're just too loveable for them to do that)

granted i have it copyrighted

i wish for a bigger hat

Granted. It's your house!

I wish for a TARDIS, or at least a trip with a TARDIS.

Granted, it explodes.

I wish that Estonia was called Bestonia in lojban.

Granted. It is now called Bestonia. Until you wake up and realized that it was all just a dream, and in actually it was called Worstonia.

I wish for bakon.

Granted. It's made out of chicken, which makes it a lot tastier than the pig stuff.

I wish for less viruses online. It's irritating having to remove them from the boyfriend's computer.

Granted! Now there is only one virus, but it's 100% lethal to all technology and spreads like the plague

I wish Pearl Harbour (the movie, not the historical battle) never happened

Granted, but a equally bad movie is made instead called Pearl Bay (also, the real Pearl Harbor is now Pearl Bay)

I wish that I was a mind reader.

Granted, you read the minds of all the people on the forums and die from fear.

I wish for more WW2 plane discussions.

Granted, but the Mw262Schwalbe quickly wins every one of them.

EDIT: Wish I could remember to wish.

Granted, you have nothing to wish for.

I wish for even more WW2 plane discussions

( The ME262 could easily be destroyed at takeoff or landing, the earlier jets had a bad acceleration rate and couldn't escape or manoeuvre. The engines also lasted for 30 hours)

Granted. (They could have covered the airstrips in a tunnel of solid concrete.)

I wish the French had made a cool fighter ever.

Granted, but all knowledge of it was destroyed when France was invaded.

I wish for more time.

( When the planes left the tunnel or went in to try and enter it, they would still of been vulnerable)

Granted, but you can only use the extra time when waiting for a bus.

I wish my tablets screen was more reliable.
